ComicInfo.Summary: Karasu may have retrieved Shirasagi from the clutches of Beelzebub once, but Hell isn't quite ready to give up its claim just yet. However, the appearance of Koumori and Sarugami--a new ally and an old friend--may force our pair to not only acknowledge their debt to each other, but their true feelings as well.
